basics.name: Kun Qiu

basics.summary: A self aspired engineer interested in data driven solution for aerospace with computational methods.

work.name: Vanderbilt University
work.position: Comustion and Laser Diagnostic Lab Research Assistant
work.summary: Research assistant in charge of developing new technique for velocity measurement using molecular tagging velocimetry.

work.name: Vanderbilt University
work.summary: Research assistant in charge of developing technique for micronewton measurement using cantileaver beams and automatation of the deflection angle detection.

projects.name: 3D Molecular Tagging Velocimetry
projects.summary: Molecular tagging velocimetry with stereoscopic imaging setup for 3D velocity field reconstruction using calibration based method.

projects.name: 2D Molecular Tagging Velocimetry
projects.summary: Developing 2D algorithms for feature detection in the molecular tagging velocimetry.

projects.name: Thermofluid interaction between Thermoelectric and Can Cooler Device
projects.summary: Analysis of the effectiveness of thermoelectric device as method of cooling.

projects.name: Force Detection for Biological Adhesive
projects.summary: Effectiveness of various biological adhesive through automated characterization of adhesion and frictional forces.

projects.name: Wheelchair to Heaven
projects.summary: Design and devlope a wheel chair lift mechanism.

projects.name: Solar Panel Rotational Platform
projects.summary: Design and devlope a platform that maximize the sun exposure duration on the solar panel.
